member.name: M:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.EmailAddress.TryParse(System.String,Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.EmailAddress@)
member.summary: Attempts to parse the given string as an email address.
member.param: The string that represents the email address.
The parsed email address, if the parsing was successful.
member.returns: Returns true if the parsing was successful, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.EmailAttachment.Content
member.summary: The base64 encoded content of the attachment.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.EmailAttachment.Type
member.summary: The MIME type of the attachment.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.EmailAttachment.Filename
member.summary: The file name of the attachment.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus
member.summary: Represents the possible statuses of an email delivery status updates by SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Unknown
member.summary: The status of the email is unknown.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Processed
member.summary: The email has been processed by SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Dropped
member.summary: The email has been dropped by SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Delivered
member.summary: The email has been delivered to the recipient.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Bounce
member.summary: The email has bounced back to SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Deferred
member.summary: The delivery of the email has been deferred by SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Open
member.summary: The email has been opened by the recipient.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Click
member.summary: The email has been clicked by the recipient.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.SpamReport
member.summary: The email has been marked as spam by the recipient.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.Unsubscribe
member.summary: The recipient has unsubscribed from the email list.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.GroupUnsubscribe
member.summary: The recipient has unsubscribed from a group email list.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEmailStatus.GroupResubscribe
member.summary: The recipient has resubscribed to a group email list.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType
member.summary: Represents the type of events notified by a SendGrid webhook.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Unknown
member.summary: The type of the event is unknown.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Processed
member.summary: The email has been successfully processed by SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Deferred
member.summary: The email could not be delivered immediately and has been temporarily deferred by SendGrid.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Delivered
member.summary: The email has been successfully delivered to the recipient's email server.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Opened
member.summary: The recipient has opened the email.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Clicked
member.summary: The recipient has clicked a link in the email.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Bounced
member.summary: The email has bounced and could not be delivered to the recipient.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Dropped
member.summary: The email has been dropped by SendGrid due to a policy violation or other issue.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.SpamReported
member.summary: The recipient has marked the email as spam.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.Unsubscribed
member.summary: The recipient has unsubscribed from the email.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.GroupUnsubscribed
member.summary: The recipient has unsubscribed from a specific email group.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.GroupResubscribed
member.summary: The recipient has resubscribed to a specific email group.

member.name: F:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridEventType.ProcessedInbound
member.summary: The email has been successfully processed by SendGrid and was an inbound message.

member.name: T:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook
member.summary: Represents a webhook event from SendGrid, that informs of a change in the status of an email message.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the email address of the recipient.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.TimeStamp
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp of the event in Unix seconds.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.SmtpId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the email message as assigned by the SendGrid SMTP server.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.EventType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the event.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Categories
member.summary: Gets or sets the categories of the email message, that can be used to filter the events.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.EventId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the event.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.MessageId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier of the message.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Response
member.summary: Gets or sets a response message from the recipient's email server.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Attempts
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times SendGrid has attempted to deliver the email.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.UserAgent
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-agent of the recipient's email client.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.ClientIpAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address of the recipient that triggered the event.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.IpPoolName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the IP pool that the email was sent from.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.SenderIpAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of that sent the email.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL that was clicked and triggered this event.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Reason
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason why the event occurred.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.ReasonCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the reason code for the event.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the email message.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the status code returned by the recipient's email server.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.Tls
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether TLS was used in the transmission of the email

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.CertError
member.summary: Gets or sets the certificate error that occurred, if any.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.AsmGroupId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of the unsubscribe group the email recipient is a member of.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.AsmpTemplateId
member.summary: Gets or sets The identifier of the AMP template used for the email.

member.name: P:Deveel.Webhooks.SendGrid.SendGridWebhook.BatchId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier of batch that the email was a part of.
